mapper.select:
select ,
d.DEPT_NAME,
ue.DUTY_TYPE from user u
INNER JOIN department d ON u.DEPT_ID = d.DEPT_ID
INNER JOIN user_ext ue ON u.UID = ue.UID where 1=1 AND (u.DEPT_ID = #{deptId} OR (u.DEPT_ID_OTHER LIKE CONCAT('%,',#{deptId},',%') OR u.DEPT_ID_OTHER LIKE CONCAT(#{deptId},',%')) )
and u.NOT_LOGIN = ${notLogin}
ORDER BY u.USER_NO;

select ,
d.DEPT_NAME,
ue.DUTY_TYPE from "USER" u
INNER JOIN department d ON u.DEPT_ID = d.DEPT_ID
INNER JOIN user_ext ue ON u."UID" = ue."UID" where 1=1 AND (u.DEPT_ID = #{deptId} OR (u.DEPT_ID_OTHER LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%,',#{deptId}),',%') OR u.DEPT_ID_OTHER LIKE CONCAT(#{deptId},',%')) )
and u.NOT_LOGIN = ${notLogin}
ORDER BY u.USER_NO;

SELECT , d.DEPT_NAME from `user` u INNER JOIN department d ON u.DEPT_ID = d.DEPT_ID WHERE 1 = 1
AND d.dept_no LIKE CONCAT (#{deptNo},'%')
ORDER BY u.USER_NO

select ,
d.DEPT_NAME,
ue.DUTY_TYPE from "USER" u
INNER JOIN department d ON u.DEPT_ID = d.DEPT_ID
INNER JOIN user_ext ue ON u."UID" = ue."UID" where 1=1 AND (u.DEPT_ID = #{deptId} OR (u.DEPT_ID_OTHER LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%,',#{deptId}),',%') OR u.DEPT_ID_OTHER LIKE CONCAT(#{deptId},',%')) )
and u.NOT_LOGIN = ${notLogin}
ORDER BY u.USER_NO;

select , d.DEPT_NAME,ue.* from "USER" u , department d , user_ext ue where u.DEPT_ID= d.DEPT_ID and ue."UID"=u."UID" and u."UID"= #{uid}
select , d.DEPT_NAME,ue.nick_name,ue.bbs_counter,ue.score,ue.duty_type,ue.login_restriction from "USER" u,"department" d ,"user_ext" ue where u.DEPT_ID= d.DEPT_ID and ue.UID=u.UID and u.UID= #{uid}

select u.USER_NAME,u.SEX,u.DEPT_ID_OTHER,u.USER_PRIV_OTHER,u.USER_ID,u.POST_ID,U.AVATAR,U.UID,u.USER_PRIV,u.DEPT_ID,u.AVATAR_128,u.MOBIL_NO,u.OICQ_NO,u.TEL_NO_DEPT,u.EMAIL,u.BIRTHDAY,u.USER_PRIV_NAME,u.BYNAME,u.LAST_VISIT_TIME, d.DEPT_NAME,ue.* from user u,department d ,user_ext ue where u.DEPT_ID= d.DEPT_ID and ue.uid=u.uid and u.UID= #{uid}

select u.USER_NAME,u.SEX,u.DEPT_ID_OTHER,u.USER_PRIV_OTHER,u.USER_ID,u.POST_ID,U.AVATAR,U.UID,u.USER_PRIV,u.DEPT_ID,u.AVATAR_128,u.MOBIL_NO,u.OICQ_NO,u.TEL_NO_DEPT,u.EMAIL,u.BIRTHDAY,u.USER_PRIV_NAME,u.BYNAME,u.LAST_VISIT_TIME, d.DEPT_NAME,ue.* from "USER" u,department d ,user_ext ue where u.DEPT_ID= d.DEPT_ID and ue."UID"=u."UID" and u."UID" = #{uid}

WHERE
UE."UID" = U."UID" AND U."UID" = #{uid} AND ( D.DEPT_ID = U.DEPT_ID OR U.DEPT_ID = 0 )

select u.USER_NAME as userName,u.sex, u.USER_NAME as name ,u.USER_PRIV_NAME as userPrivName,u.USER_ID AS userId, d.DEPT_NAME as deptName ,u.UID ,u.AVATAR ,u.USER_ID as userId from user u ,department d where u.DEPT_ID= d.DEPT_ID AND u.DEPT_ID!=0 AND u.NOT_LOGIN!=1 AND ( u.USER_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{userName}), '%') or u.USER_PRIV_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{userPrivName}), '%') or d.DEPT_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{deptName}), '%') or u.USER_ID like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{userId}), '%') or u.BYNAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{byName}), '%')) ORDER BY user_priv_no,user_no

and USING_FINGER = #{usingFinger},

mapper.select: select u.USER_NAME,u.user_priv_name,u.user_id,u.dept_id,d.dept_name, u."UID",u.avatar,u.sex from "USER" u ,department d WHERE u.DEPT_ID = d.DEPT_ID AND u.not_login !=1 AND u.dept_id != 0 AND (u.DEPT_ID = #{deptId} or u.DEPT_ID_OTHER LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%,',#{deptId}),',%') OR u.DEPT_ID_OTHER LIKE CONCAT(#{deptId},',%')) ORDER BY u.user_priv_no,u.user_no,u.user_name

SELECT , d.DEPT_NAME, ue.DUTY_TYPE FROM user u LEFT JOIN department d ON u.DEPT_ID = d.DEPT_ID LEFT JOIN user_ext ue ON u.uid = ue.uid WHERE u.user_id IS NOT NULL
and
d.DEPT_NO like CONCAT(#{deptNo},'%')
order by u.uid desc limit 100

select , d.DEPT_NAME,ue.DUTY_TYPE from "user" u , department d,user_ext ue where u.user_id is not null and u.DEPT_ID=d.DEPT_ID and u."uid"=ue."uid"
and
d.DEPT_NO like CONCAT(#{deptNo},'%')
and (u.LAST_VISIT_TIME is null or u.LAST_VISIT_TIME = '0000-00-00 00:00:00') ORDER BY u.user_priv_no,u.user_no

select , d.DEPT_NAME,ue.DUTY_TYPE from "user" u , department d,user_ext ue where u.user_id is not null and u.DEPT_ID=d.DEPT_ID and u."uid"=ue."uid"
and
d.DEPT_NO like CONCAT(#{deptNo},'%')
and (u.LAST_VISIT_TIME is null) ORDER BY u.user_priv_no,u.user_no

select , d.DEPT_NAME,ue.DUTY_TYPE from "user" u , department d,user_ext ue where u.user_id is not null and u.DEPT_ID=d.DEPT_ID and u."uid"=ue."uid"
and
d.DEPT_NO like CONCAT(#{deptNo},'%')
and (u.LAST_VISIT_TIME is null) ORDER BY u.user_priv_no,u.user_no

select u.USER_NAME , u.UID , u.USER_ID , u.USER_PRIV, u.USER_PRIV_NAME, d.DEPT_NAME from user u INNER JOIN department d ON u.DEPT_ID=d.DEPT_ID WHERE u.DEPT_ID = (select DEPT_PARENT from department WHERE DEPT_ID = #{deptId}) ORDER BY u.user_priv_no,u.user_no;

select u.USER_NAME , u.UID , u.USER_ID , u.USER_PRIV, u.USER_PRIV_NAME, d.DEPT_NAME from user u INNER JOIN department d ON u.DEPT_ID=d.DEPT_ID WHERE u.DEPT_ID in (select DEPT_ID from department WHERE DEPT_PARENT = #{deptId}) ORDER BY u.user_priv_no,u.user_no ;

select ,ue.DUTY_TYPE
, d.DEPT_NAME
from user u
, department d
,user_ext ue where u.user_id is not null and u.uid=ue.uid
and u.DEPT_ID=d.DEPT_ID
and u.USER_ID like concat("%", #{userId},"%")
and u.byname like concat("%", #{byname},"%")
and u.user_name like concat("%", #{userName},"%")
and u.mobil_no like concat(#{mobilNo},"%")
and u.sex = #{sex}
and u.post_Priv = #{postPriv}
and u.NOT_LOGIN = ${notLogin}
AND u.not_View_User = #{notViewUser}
AND u.not_View_Table = #{notViewTable}
AND ue.DUTY_TYPE = #{dutyType}
AND u.dept_id = 0
AND u.dept_id != 0
and
d.DEPT_NO like CONCAT(#{deptNo},'%')
${userPriv}
OR u.USER_PRIV_OTHER LIKE CONCAT('%,',#{userPriv},',%') OR u.USER_PRIV_OTHER LIKE CONCAT(#{userPriv},',%')
and
(
${deptId}
OR (u.DEPT_ID_OTHER LIKE CONCAT('%,',#{deptIda},',%') OR u.DEPT_ID_OTHER LIKE CONCAT(#{deptIda},',%')))
ORDER BY u.user_no,u.user_name

SELECT
FROM notify n, `user` u WHERE n.NOTIFY_ID = #{notifyId} AND ((n.PRIV_ID LIKE concat('%,',u.USER_PRIV,',%') OR n.PRIV_ID LIKE concat(u.USER_PRIV,',%') )OR(n.TO_ID LIKE concat('%,',u.DEPT_ID,',%') OR n.TO_ID LIKE concat(u.DEPT_ID,',%') )OR(n.USER_ID LIKE concat('%,',u.USER_ID,',%') OR n.USER_ID LIKE concat(u.USER_ID,',%') )OR n.TO_ID = 'ALL_DEPT')
AND ( n.READERS NOT LIKE concat('%,',u.USER_ID,',%') AND n.READERS NOT LIKE concat(u.USER_ID,',%') AND n.READERS NOT LIKE concat('%,',u.USER_ID) ) ORDER BY u.user_priv_no,u.user_no

SELECT
FROM notify n, "USER" u WHERE n.NOTIFY_ID = #{notifyId} AND ((n.PRIV_ID LIKE concat('%,',u.USER_PRIV,',%') OR n.PRIV_ID LIKE concat(u.USER_PRIV,',%') )OR(n.TO_ID LIKE concat('%,',u.DEPT_ID,',%') OR n.TO_ID LIKE concat(u.DEPT_ID,',%') )OR(n.USER_ID LIKE concat('%,',u.USER_ID,',%') OR n.USER_ID LIKE concat(u.USER_ID,',%') )OR n.TO_ID = 'ALL_DEPT')
ORDER BY u.user_priv_no,u.user_no

SELECT
FROM notify n, "USER" u WHERE n.NOTIFY_ID = #{notifyId} AND ( (n.PRIV_ID LIKE concat(concat('%,',u.USER_PRIV),',%') OR n.PRIV_ID LIKE concat(u.USER_PRIV,',%') ) OR(n.TO_ID LIKE concat(concat('%,',u.DEPT_ID),',%') OR n.TO_ID LIKE concat(u.DEPT_ID,',%') ) OR(n.USER_ID LIKE concat(concat('%,',u.USER_ID),',%') OR n.USER_ID LIKE concat(u.USER_ID,',%') ) OR to_char(n.TO_ID) = 'ALL_DEPT' )
ORDER BY u.user_priv_no,u.user_no

SELECT USER_PRIV.USER_PRIV as userPriv, PRIV_NAME as userPrivName FROM USER_PRIV INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT u.UID as uid,u.USER_PRIV as userPriv , u.USER_PRIV_OTHER as userPrivOther FROM `USER` u INNER JOIN department d on (u.DEPT_ID = d.DEPT_ID and u.DEPT_ID !=0 AND u.NOT_LOGIN = '0' ) INNER JOIN flow_process fp ON ( fp.PRCS_DEPT='ALL_DEPT' OR fp.PRCS_PRIV= 'ALL_PRIV' OR fp.PRCS_USER LIKE concat( '%,', u.USER_ID, ',%' ) OR fp.PRCS_USER LIKE concat( u.USER_ID, ',%' ) OR fp.PRCS_DEPT LIKE concat ( '%,', u.DEPT_ID, ',%' ) OR fp.PRCS_DEPT LIKE concat ( u.DEPT_ID, ',%' ) OR fp.PRCS_PRIV LIKE concat ( '%,', u.USER_PRIV, ',%' ) OR fp.PRCS_PRIV LIKE concat ( u.USER_PRIV, ',%' )
OR (u.USER_PRIV_OTHER LIKE concat(#{item}, ',%') OR u.USER_PRIV_OTHER LIKE concat('%,',#{item},',%'))
OR( u.DEPT_ID_OTHER LIKE CONCAT('%,',#{deptId},',%') OR u.DEPT_ID_OTHER LIKE CONCAT(#{deptId},',%'))
) WHERE fp.FLOW_ID = #{flowId}
and
d.DEPT_NO like CONCAT(#{deptNo},'%')
AND fp.PRCS_ID = #{prcsId}) USER ON ( USER_PRIV.USER_PRIV = USER.userPriv OR find_in_set( USER_PRIV.USER_PRIV, USER.userPrivOther ) ) GROUP BY USER_PRIV.USER_PRIV ORDER BY PRIV_NO,userPriv

SELECT DISTINCT u.UID as uid,u.USER_ID as userId, u.USER_NAME as userName,u.SEX as sex ,U.AVATAR as avatar,u.USER_PRIV as userPriv ,u.USER_PRIV_NO as userPrivNo,u.DEPT_ID as deptId,u.USER_PRIV_NAME as userPrivName,u.BYNAME as byname,u.USER_NO as userNo, u.USER_PRIV_OTHER as userPrivOther,privOther.userPrivOtherName as userPrivOtherName, u.DEPT_ID_OTHER as deptIdOther, d.DEPT_NAME as deptName FROM `USER` u INNER JOIN department d on (u.DEPT_ID = d.DEPT_ID and u.DEPT_ID !=0 AND u.NOT_LOGIN = '0') INNER JOIN flow_process fp ON ( fp.PRCS_DEPT='ALL_DEPT' OR fp.PRCS_PRIV= 'ALL_PRIV' OR fp.PRCS_USER LIKE concat( '%,', u.USER_ID, ',%' ) OR fp.PRCS_USER LIKE concat( u.USER_ID, ',%' ) OR fp.PRCS_DEPT LIKE concat ( '%,', u.DEPT_ID, ',%' ) OR fp.PRCS_DEPT LIKE concat ( u.DEPT_ID, ',%' ) OR fp.PRCS_PRIV LIKE concat ( '%,', u.USER_PRIV, ',%' ) OR fp.PRCS_PRIV LIKE concat ( u.USER_PRIV, ',%' )
OR (u.USER_PRIV_OTHER LIKE concat(#{item}, ',%') OR u.USER_PRIV_OTHER LIKE concat('%,',#{item},',%'))
OR( u.DEPT_ID_OTHER LIKE CONCAT('%,',#{deptId},',%') OR u.DEPT_ID_OTHER LIKE CONCAT(#{deptId},',%'))
) left join (SELECT USER.uid as privOtherUid, GROUP_CONCAT( user_priv.PRIV_NAME ) AS userPrivOtherName FROM USER INNER JOIN USER_PRIV ON FIND_IN_SET( user_priv.USER_PRIV, USER.USER_PRIV_OTHER ) GROUP BY USER.uid ) as privOther on privOtherUid = uid WHERE fp.FLOW_ID = #{flowId} AND fp.PRCS_ID = #{prcsId} and (u.USER_PRIV= #{userPriv} OR (u.USER_PRIV_OTHER LIKE concat(#{userPriv}, ',%') OR u.USER_PRIV_OTHER LIKE concat('%,',#{userPriv},',%'))) order by u.USER_PRIV_NO, u.USER_NO, u.USER_NAME

SELECT u.UID as uid,u.USER_ID as userId,u.USER_SECRECY as userSecrecy, u.USER_NAME as userName,u.SEX as sex ,U.AVATAR as avatar,u.USER_PRIV as userPriv ,u.USER_PRIV_NO as userPrivNo,u.DEPT_ID as deptId,u.USER_PRIV_NAME as userPrivName,u.BYNAME as byname,u.USER_NO as userNo, u.USER_PRIV_OTHER as userPrivOther,privOther.userPrivOtherName, u.DEPT_ID_OTHER as deptIdOther, d.DEPT_NAME as deptName FROM USER u INNER JOIN department d on u.DEPT_ID = d.DEPT_ID left join (SELECT USER.uid as privOtherUid, GROUP_CONCAT( user_priv.PRIV_NAME ) AS userPrivOtherName FROM USER INNER JOIN USER_PRIV ON FIND_IN_SET( user_priv.USER_PRIV, USER.USER_PRIV_OTHER ) GROUP BY USER.uid ) as privOther on privOtherUid = uid where u.UID in
#{item}
and (u.DEPT_ID = #{deptId} OR ( u.DEPT_ID_OTHER LIKE CONCAT('%,',#{deptId},',%') OR u.DEPT_ID_OTHER LIKE CONCAT(#{deptId},',%')) )
and (u.USER_PRIV = #{userPriv} OR (u.USER_PRIV_OTHER LIKE concat(#{userPriv}, ',%') OR u.USER_PRIV_OTHER LIKE concat('%,',#{userPriv},',%')) )
and (u.USER_NAME LIKE concat('%',#{search},'%')
or u.USER_NAME_INDEX LIKE concat('%',#{search1},'%')
)
order by u.USER_PRIV_NO, u.USER_NO, u.USER_NAME

SELECT u."UID" as "uid",u.USER_ID as userId,u.USER_SECRECY as userSecrecy, u.USER_NAME as userName,u.SEX as sex ,U.AVATAR as avatar,u.USER_PRIV as userPriv ,u.USER_PRIV_NO as userPrivNo,u.DEPT_ID as deptId,u.USER_PRIV_NAME as userPrivName,u.BYNAME as byname,u.USER_NO as userNo, u.USER_PRIV_OTHER as userPrivOther,privOther.userPrivOtherName, u.DEPT_ID_OTHER as deptIdOther, d.DEPT_NAME as deptName FROM "USER" u INNER JOIN "department" d on u.DEPT_ID = d.DEPT_ID left join (SELECT u2."uid" as privOtherUid, wm_concat( user_priv.PRIV_NAME ) AS userPrivOtherName FROM "USER" u2 INNER JOIN USER_PRIV ON instr(concat(concat(',',u2.USER_PRIV_OTHER),','),user_priv.USER_PRIV) GROUP BY u2."uid" ) as privOther on privOtherUid = "uid" where u."UID" in
#{item}
and (u.DEPT_ID = #{deptId} OR ( u.DEPT_ID_OTHER LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%,',#{deptId}),',%') OR u.DEPT_ID_OTHER LIKE CONCAT(#{deptId},',%')) )
and (u.USER_PRIV = #{userPriv} OR (u.USER_PRIV_OTHER LIKE concat(#{userPriv}, ',%') OR u.USER_PRIV_OTHER LIKE concat(CONCAT('%,',#{userPriv}),',%')) )
and (u.USER_NAME LIKE concat(CONCAT('%',#{search}),'%')
or u.USER_NAME_INDEX LIKE concat(CONCAT('%',#{search1}),'%')
)
order by u.USER_PRIV_NO, u.USER_NO, u.USER_NAME

#{item}
and (u.DEPT_ID = #{deptId} OR ( u.DEPT_ID_OTHER LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%,',#{deptId}),',%') OR u.DEPT_ID_OTHER LIKE CONCAT(#{deptId},',%')) )
and (u.USER_PRIV = #{userPriv} OR (u.USER_PRIV_OTHER LIKE concat(#{userPriv}, ',%') OR u.USER_PRIV_OTHER LIKE concat(CONCAT('%,',#{userPriv}),',%')) )
and (u.USER_NAME LIKE concat(CONCAT('%',#{search}),'%')
or u.USER_NAME_INDEX LIKE concat(CONCAT('%',#{search1}),'%')
)
order by u.USER_PRIV_NO, u.USER_NO, u.USER_NAME

SELECT UID, USER_NAME, DEPT_ID, USER_PRIV, USER_PRIV_NO, DEPT_ID_OTHER, USER_PRIV_OTHER, POST_PRIV, POST_DEPT FROM "USER" WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND NOT_LOGIN = 0

SELECT substring_index( substring_index( DEPT_NAME, '/', 2 ), '/',- 1 ) AS ONE_DEPT_NAME, ##一级部门 substring_index( substring_index( DEPT_NAME, '/', 3 ), '/',- 1 ) AS TWO_DEPT_NAME, ##二级部门 substring_index( substring_index( DEPT_NAME, '/', 4 ), '/',- 1 ) AS THREE_DEPT_NAME, ##三级部门 substring_index( substring_index( DEPT_NAME, '/', 5 ), '/',- 1 ) AS FOUR_DEPT_NAME, ##四级部门 IFNULL(USER_ID, '' ) AS USER_ID, ##日志发起人ID IFNULL(BYNAME, '' ) AS BYNAME, ##用户工号 IFNULL(USER_PRIV_NAME, '' ) AS USER_PRIV_NAME, ##岗位角色 IFNULL(USER_NAME, '' ) AS USER_NAME, ##用户名称 IFNULL(USER_PRIV_OTHER, '' ) AS USER_PRIV_OTHER, ##辅助角色 IFNULL(ISFLAG, '' ) AS ISFLAG, ##区间时间内是否有提交日志，1-有 IFNULL(DIA_ID, '' ) AS DIA_ID, IFNULL(DIA_TYPE, '' ) AS DIA_TYPE, ##日志类型 IFNULL(DIA_TYPE_NAME, '' ) AS DIA_TYPE_NAME, ##日志类型名称 IFNULL(DIA_DATE, '' ) AS DIA_DATE, ##日志日期 IFNULL(SUBJECT, '' ) AS SUBJECT, ##日志标题 IFNULL(CONTENT, '' ) AS CONTENT, IFNULL(DIA_TIME, '' ) AS DIA_TIME, ##提交时间 IFNULL(TO_ID, '' ) AS TO_ID, IFNULL(USER_TOP_ID, '' ) AS USER_TOP_ID, ##汇报上级ID IFNULL((SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(substring_index(USER_NAME,'/',-1)) FROM USER WHERE FIND_IN_SET(USER_ID,USER_TOP_ID)),'' ) AS USER_TOP_ID_NAME, ##汇报上级名称 IFNULL( GROUP_CONCAT( DC_COMMENT_TXT ), '' ) AS COMMENT_TXT, ##评阅内容 IFNULL( LENGTH( IFNULL( GROUP_CONCAT( DC_COMMENT_TXT ), '' ) ), 0 ) AS COMMENT_LENGTH, ##评阅字数 IFNULL( IF( LENGTH( IFNULL( GROUP_CONCAT( DC_COMMENT_TXT ), '' ) ) > 15, '有', '无'), '无') AS COMMENT_LENGTH_JUDGE ##有无超过15个字 FROM ( SELECT u.USER_ID AS USER_ID, u.BYNAME AS BYNAME, u.USER_NAME AS USER_NAME, u.USER_PRIV_NAME AS USER_PRIV_NAME, u.USER_PRIV_OTHER AS USER_PRIV_OTHER, dept.DEPT_NAME AS DEPT_NAME, dept.DEPT_NO AS DEPT_NO, d.DIA_ID AS DIA_ID, CASE IFNULL(d.DIA_ID,'') WHEN '' THEN '无' ELSE '有' END AS ISFLAG, d.DIA_TYPE, CASE d.DIA_TYPE WHEN '1' THEN '工作日志' WHEN '2' THEN '个人日志' WHEN '3' THEN '工作周报' WHEN '4' THEN '工作月报' ELSE '其他' END AS DIA_TYPE_NAME, d.DIA_DATE AS DIA_DATE, d.SUBJECT AS SUBJECT, d.CONTENT AS CONTENT, d.TO_ID AS TO_ID, d.DIA_TIME AS DIA_TIME, IFNULL( d.USER_TOP_ID, '' ) AS USER_TOP_ID, CONCAT( '【', IFNULL( dcu.USER_NAME, dc.USER_ID ), '：\n', IFNULL( dc.CONTENT, '' ), ' \n[点评时间:', dc.SEND_TIME, ']】\n') AS DC_COMMENT_TXT FROM USER u LEFT JOIN v_dept_info dept ON dept.DEPT_ID = u.DEPT_ID LEFT JOIN diary d ON d.USER_ID = u.USER_ID AND ( d.DIA_DATE >= #{startDate} AND d.DIA_DATE <= #{endDate} ) AND d.SFLAG = 1 AND d.DIA_TYPE = 3 LEFT JOIN diary_comment dc ON dc.DIA_ID = d.DIA_ID
AND dc.SEND_TIME < CONCAT(#{sendDate}, ' 23:59:59')
LEFT JOIN USER dcu ON dcu.USER_ID = dc.USER_ID WHERE u.DEPT_ID IN ( SELECT dept_id FROM department WHERE
dept_no LIKE CONCAT(#{deptNo}, '%')
) AND u.USER_PRIV_OTHER REGEXP '2070|2071' ORDER BY LENGTH( dc.CONTENT ) DESC, dc.send_time DESC ) T GROUP BY USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_PRIV_OTHER, DIA_ID ORDER BY DEPT_NO ASC,LENGTH(DEPT_NO) ASC

SELECT substring( DEPT_NAME, '/' , 1 , CHARINDEX('/', DEPT_NAME, CHARINDEX('/', DEPT_NAME) + 1) - 1 ) AS ONE_DEPT_NAME, substring( DEPT_NAME, '/', CHARINDEX('/', DEPT_NAME, CHARINDEX('/', DEPT_NAME) + 1) + 1 , CHARINDEX('/', DEPT_NAME, CHARINDEX('/', DEPT_NAME, CHARINDEX('/', DEPT_NAME) + 1) + 1) - CHARINDEX('/', DEPT_NAME, CHARINDEX('/', DEPT_NAME) + 1) - 1 ) AS TWO_DEPT_NAME, substring( DEPT_NAME, '/', CHARINDEX('/', DEPT_NAME, CHARINDEX('/', DEPT_NAME, CHARINDEX('/', DEPT_NAME) + 1) + 1) + 1 , CHARINDEX('/', DEPT_NAME, CHARINDEX('/', DEPT_NAME, CHARINDEX('/', DEPT_NAME, CHARINDEX('/', DEPT_NAME) + 1) + 1) + 1) - CHARINDEX('/', DEPT_NAME, CHARINDEX('/', DEPT_NAME, CHARINDEX('/', DEPT_NAME) + 1) + 1) - 1 ) AS THREE_DEPT_NAME, substring( DEPT_NAME, '/', CHARINDEX('/', DEPT_NAME, CHARINDEX('/', DEPT_NAME, CHARINDEX('/', DEPT_NAME, CHARINDEX('/', DEPT_NAME) + 1) + 1) + 1) + 1 , LENGTH(DEPT_NAME) - CHARINDEX('/', DEPT_NAME, CHARINDEX('/', DEPT_NAME, CHARINDEX('/', DEPT_NAME, CHARINDEX('/', DEPT_NAME) + 1) + 1) + 1) ) AS FOUR_DEPT_NAME, COALESCE(USER_ID, '' ) AS USER_ID, COALESCE(BYNAME, '' ) AS BYNAME, COALESCE(USER_PRIV_NAME, '' ) AS USER_PRIV_NAME, COALESCE(USER_NAME, '' ) AS USER_NAME, COALESCE(USER_PRIV_OTHER, '' ) AS USER_PRIV_OTHER, COALESCE(ISFLAG, '' ) AS ISFLAG, COALESCE(DIA_ID, '' ) AS DIA_ID, COALESCE(DIA_TYPE, '' ) AS DIA_TYPE, CASE WHEN DIA_TYPE = '1' THEN '工作日志' WHEN DIA_TYPE = '2' THEN '个人日志' WHEN DIA_TYPE = '3' THEN '工作周报' WHEN DIA_TYPE = '4' THEN '工作月报' ELSE '其他' END AS DIA_TYPE_NAME, COALESCE(DIA_DATE, '' ) AS DIA_DATE, COALESCE(SUBJECT, '' ) AS SUBJECT, COALESCE(CONTENT, '' ) AS CONTENT, COALESCE(DIA_TIME, '' ) AS DIA_TIME, COALESCE(TO_ID, '' ) AS TO_ID, COALESCE(USER_TOP_ID, '' ) AS USER_TOP_ID, COALESCE((SELECT listagg(substring(USER_NAME,'/', length(USER_NAME) - INSTR(reverse(USER_NAME), '/')+2 ), ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY USER_NAME DESC) FROM "USER" WHERE USER_ID IN (SELECT regexp_split_to_table(USER_TOP_ID, ',')) ),'' ) AS USER_TOP_ID_NAME, COALESCE( LISTAGG( DC_COMMENT_TXT, ',' ) WITHIN GROUP ( ORDER BY DC_COMMENT_TXT DESC ), '' ) AS COMMENT_TXT, COALESCE( LENGTH( LISTAGG( DC_COMMENT_TXT, ',' ) WITHIN GROUP ( ORDER BY DC_COMMENT_TXT DESC ) ), 0 ) AS COMMENT_LENGTH, CASE WHEN LENGTH( LISTAGG( DC_COMMENT_TXT, ',' ) WITHIN GROUP ( ORDER BY DC_COMMENT_TXT DESC ) ) > 15 THEN '有' ELSE '无' END AS COMMENT_LENGTH_JUDGE FROM ( SELECT u.USER_ID AS USER_ID, u.BYNAME AS BYNAME, u.USER_NAME AS USER_NAME, u.USER_PRIV_NAME AS USER_PRIV_NAME, u.USER_PRIV_OTHER AS USER_PRIV_OTHER, dept.DEPT_NAME AS DEPT_NAME, dept.DEPT_NO AS DEPT_NO, d.DIA_ID AS DIA_ID, CASE WHEN COALESCE(d.DIA_ID,'') = '' THEN '无' ELSE '有' END AS ISFLAG, d.DIA_TYPE, d.DIA_DATE AS DIA_DATE, d.SUBJECT AS SUBJECT, d.CONTENT AS CONTENT, d.TO_ID AS TO_ID, d.DIA_TIME AS DIA_TIME, COALESCE( d.USER_TOP_ID, '' ) AS USER_TOP_ID, CONCAT( '【', COALESCE( dcu.USER_NAME, dc.USER_ID ), '：\n', COALESCE( dc.CONTENT, '' ), ' \n[点评时间:', dc.SEND_TIME, ']】\n') AS DC_COMMENT_TXT FROM "USER" u LEFT JOIN department dept ON dept.DEPT_ID = u.DEPT_ID LEFT JOIN diary d ON d.USER_ID = u.USER_ID AND ( d.DIA_DATE >= #{startDate} AND d.DIA_DATE <= #{endDate} ) AND d.SFLAG = 1 AND d.DIA_TYPE = 3 LEFT JOIN diary_comment dc ON dc.DIA_ID = d.DIA_ID
AND dc.SEND_TIME < CONCAT(#{sendDate}, ' 23:59:59')
LEFT JOIN "USER" dcu ON dcu.USER_ID = dc.USER_ID WHERE u.DEPT_ID IN ( SELECT dept_id FROM department WHERE
dept_no LIKE CONCAT(#{deptNo}::VARCHAR , '%')
) AND u.USER_PRIV_OTHER ~* '2070|2071' ORDER BY LENGTH( dc.CONTENT ) DESC, dc.send_time DESC ) T GROUP BY USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_PRIV_OTHER, DIA_ID, DEPT_NAME, ONE_DEPT_NAME, TWO_DEPT_NAME, THREE_DEPT_NAME, FOUR_DEPT_NAME, BYNAME, USER_PRIV_NAME, DIA_TYPE, DIA_TYPE_NAME, DIA_DATE, SUBJECT, CONTENT, DIA_TIME, TO_ID, USER_TOP_ID, COMMENT_LENGTH_JUDGE ORDER BY DEPT_NO ASC, LENGTH(DEPT_NO) ASC
SELECT USER_ID, USER_NAME FROM USER WHERE NOT_LOGIN = 0 AND DEPT_ID = #{deptId} OR FIND_IN_SET( #{deptId}, DEPT_ID_OTHER ) ORDER BY USER_NO, USER_NAME
SELECT USER_ID, USER_NAME FROM "USER" WHERE NOT_LOGIN = 0 AND DEPT_ID = #{deptId} OR FIND_IN_SET( #{deptId}, DEPT_ID_OTHER ) ORDER BY USER_NO, USER_NAME
select user_id,user_name from user where user_priv_other!='';
select user_id,user_name from "USER" where user_priv_other!='';
select user_id,user_name from user where DEPT_ID_OTHER!=''
select user_id,user_name from "USER" where DEPT_ID_OTHER!=''
select from user where USER_NAME =#{userName}

select count(u."UID") from "USER" u INNER JOIN department d ON u.DEPT_ID = d.DEPT_ID
